name: campeonatos-stats
description: Campeonatos Stats - API e Frontend para estatísticas de futebol

scripts.deploy:frontend: docker-compose stop frontend && docker-compose build --no-cache frontend && docker-compose up -d frontend
scripts.deploy:api: docker-compose stop api && docker-compose build --no-cache api && docker-compose up -d api
scripts.deploy:chat: docker-compose stop api && docker-compose build --no-cache api && docker-compose up -d api
scripts.deploy:chatbot: docker-compose stop api && docker-compose build --no-cache api && docker-compose up -d api
scripts.deploy:all: docker-compose down && docker-compose build --no-cache && docker-compose up -d
scripts.deploy:prod: docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml down && docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml build --no-cache && docker-compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d
scripts.deploy:dev: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml build --no-cache && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d
scripts.restart:frontend: docker-compose stop frontend && docker-compose build frontend && docker-compose up -d frontend
scripts.restart:api: docker-compose stop api && docker-compose build api && docker-compose up -d api
scripts.restart:chat: docker-compose stop api && docker-compose build api && docker-compose up -d api
scripts.restart:chatbot: docker-compose stop api && docker-compose build api && docker-compose up -d api
scripts.restart:all: docker-compose down && docker-compose build && docker-compose up -d
scripts.restart:services: docker-compose stop api celery-worker celery-beat && docker-compose build api celery-worker celery-beat && docker-compose up -d api celery-worker celery-beat
scripts.health: docker-compose ps && echo '' && docker-compose exec -T api python -c "import sys; sys.path.insert(0, '/app'); from app.core.database import check_db_connection; check_db_connection()" 2>&1 || echo 'Health check: API não respondeu'
scripts.health:api: docker-compose exec -T api python -c "import sys; sys.path.insert(0, '/app'); from app.core.database import check_db_connection; check_db_connection()" 2>&1 || echo 'Health check failed'
scripts.clean:images: docker-compose down && docker images -q campeonatos_stats* | ForEach-Object { if ($_) { docker rmi $_ } }
scripts.shell:db: docker-compose exec postgres psql -U postgres -d campeonatos_stats
scripts.db:backup: docker-compose exec -T postgres pg_dump -U postgres campeonatos_stats > backup_$(Get-Date -Format 'yyyyMMdd_HHmmss').sql && echo Backup criado
scripts.db:restore: echo Use: docker-compose exec -T postgres psql -U postgres -d campeonatos_stats < backup.sql
scripts.db:stats: docker-compose exec -T postgres psql -U postgres -d campeonatos_stats -c "SELECT 'Leagues' as table_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM leagues UNION ALL SELECT 'Teams', COUNT(*) FROM teams UNION ALL SELECT 'Fixtures', COUNT(*) FROM fixtures UNION ALL SELECT 'Players', COUNT(*) FROM players UNION ALL SELECT 'Team Statistics', COUNT(*) FROM team_statistics;"
scripts.init: docker-compose up -d postgres redis rabbitmq && timeout /t 5 && docker-compose up -d
scripts.quick:frontend: docker-compose build frontend && docker-compose up -d frontend
scripts.quick:api: docker-compose build api && docker-compose up -d api
scripts.quick:chat: docker-compose build api && docker-compose up -d api
